intro: Aneilema pusillum, commonly known as the small aneilema, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Commelinaceae, which includes plants like spiderworts and grasses. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and wetlands. It features small, delicate flowers that are often greenish or white in color. Its leaves are usually narrow and arranged in a spiral pattern along the stem.
